Package common.hardware.motorcontroller

Class NAR_Motor

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.hardware.motorcontroller.NAR_Motor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NAR_CANSpark, NAR_TalonFX, NAR_TalonSRX
    public abstract class NAR_Motor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Team 3128's motor class replacement for MotorController
    Since:
    2023 Charged Up

        public abstract void configPID​(PIDFFConfig config)
        Set the PID values for the controller.
        Parameters:
        config - PIDFFConfig containing kP, kI, and kD values.

      • enableContinuousInput

        public void enableContinuousInput​(double minInput,
                                  double maxInput)
        Enables continuous input.

        Rather then using the max and min input range as constraints, the motor considers them to be the same point and automatically calculates the shortest route to the setpoint.

        Parameters:
        minInput - The minimum value expected from the input.
        maxInput - The maximum value expected from the input.

      • setUnitConversionFactor

        public void setUnitConversionFactor​(double conversionFactor)
        Changes the units the motor measures position in, ie. rotations degrees
        Parameters:
        conversionFactor - Conversion factor to change position units

      • setTimeConversionFactor

        public void setTimeConversionFactor​(double conversionFactor)
        Changes the units the motor measures time/velocity in, ie. rotations per minute rotations per second
        Parameters:
        conversionFactor - Conversion factor to change time units
